mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID, STORE.STORE_ID, EMPLOYEE.EMP_NAME, EMPLOYEE.ADDRESS, EMPLOYEE.PHONENUM, EMPLOYEE.EMAIL, EMPLOYEE.WORKTIME, EMPLOYEE.BANKACCOUNT, EMPLOYEE.SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE, STORE WHERE STORE.STORE_ID = #{param2} AND EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID = #{param1}

SELECT EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID, STORE.STORE_ID, EMPLOYEE.EMP_NAME, EMPLOYEE.ADDRESS, EMPLOYEE.PHONENUM, EMPLOYEE.EMAIL, EMPLOYEE.WORKTIME, EMPLOYEE.BANKACCOUNT, EMPLOYEE.SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE, STORE WHERE STORE.STORE_ID = #{param1} ORDER BY EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, STORE_ID, EMP_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONENUM, EMAIL, WORKTIME, BANKACCOUNT, SALARY) VALUES (emp_seq.nextval, #{store_id}, #{emp_name}, #{address}, #{phonenum}, #{email}, #{worktime}, #{bankaccount}, #{salary})
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_NAME = #{emp_name}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONENUM = #{phonenum}, EMAIL = #{email}, WORKTIME = #{worktime}, BANKACCOUNT = #{bankaccount}, SALARY = #{salary} WHERE EMP_ID = #{emp_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE STORE_ID = #{param2} AND EMP_ID = #{param1}
